front.title: Requirements for Distinguished Names in Autonomous to Loosely-coupled LDAP-based Directory Services

abstract.t: This document analyzes the issues involved in the Distinguished Name- spaces of autonomous to loosely-coupled, LDAP-based directory services (LLDSs). It folds in experience learned from the global X.500-based Dis- tinguished Name-space, and proposes requirements for the construction of Distinguished Names for LLDSs of varying scopes.
